headline: Aflac joins Workday Wellness Partner Program to provide a more personalized benefit experience to support employee health
summary: Aflac, a leading provider of supplemental insurance in the U.S.1 today announced it has been named a strategic Workday Wellness partner for supplemental health solutions. Through this engagement, Aflac can integrate its supplemental health products and services with Workday Wellness, empowering employers with AI-driven recommendations to improve benefit offerings and streamline their benefits administration.
